#   This list contains IP addresses associated with Amazon EC2 instances.
#   
#   Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) allows customers to deploy and run
#   virtual machines on demand. These instances may sometimes attempt to
#   connect to or scan external servers.
#   
#   While illegal activity violates Amazon's Terms of Service, abuse can
#   occur. This blocklist helps prevent communication between your server
#   and Amazon EC2-hosted systems.
